titles.title: Journalism Competition and Preservation Act of 2019
Journalism Competition and Preservation Act of 2019
A bill to provide a temporary safe harbor for publishers of online content to collectively negotiate with dominant online platforms regarding the terms on which content may be distributed.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Journalism Competition and Preservation Act of 2019
This bill creates a four-year safe harbor from antitrust laws for print or digital news companies to collectively negotiate with online content distributors (e.g., social media companies) regarding the terms on which the news companies' content may be distributed by online content distributors.
